Ability.Name: USE: Gloves
Ability.Lua:
local _,cd,havecd = GetInventoryItemCooldown("player",10)
if cd == 0 and havecd == 1 and not UnitChannelInfo("player") then UseInventoryItem(10) return true end

Ability.Name: USE: Trinket 1
Ability.Lua: if GetInventoryItemCooldown("player",13) == 0 then UseInventoryItem(13) end

Ability.Name: USE: Trinket 2
Ability.Lua:
local _,cd,havecd = GetInventoryItemCooldown("player",14)
if cd == 0 and havecd == 1 and not UnitChannelInfo("player") then UseInventoryItem(14) return true end

Ability.Name: --- offensive spells ---
Ability.Lua:
if not rightkeydown then rightkeydown = 0 end
if IsRightControlKeyDown() and GetTime() - rightkeydown > 0.3 then rightkeydown = GetTime() if setAoE then setAoE = false print("Rotation mode: \124cFFDBFA2ASingle target") else setAoE = true print("Rotation mode: \124cFFFA652AArea of Effect") end end
if UnitIsDead("target") or ImmuneTarget("target") or not UnitCanAttack("player","target") or tonumber(UnitGUID("target"):sub(5,5),16) == 4 or ( not UnitAffectingCombat("target") and not SpecialAggro("target") and not UnitIsPlayer("target") ) or UnitBuffID("player",5384) then return true end

Ability.Name: Trap Launcher
Mend Pet
Ability.Lua: if UnitExists("pet") and not UnitIsDead("pet") and 100 * UnitHealth("pet") / UnitHealthMax("pet") < 90 and not UnitBuffID("pet",136) and not UnitAffectingCombat("player") then return true end

Ability.Name: Misdirection
Ability.Lua:
if not HaveTank then function HaveTank() local group = "party" local members = GetNumPartyMembers() if GetNumRaidMembers() > 0 then group = "raid" members = GetNumRaidMembers() end for i = 1, members, 1 do local member = group..tostring(i) if UnitGroupRolesAssigned(member) == "TANK" and not UnitIsDeadOrGhost(member) then return member end end end end
if HaveTank() then PQR_CustomTarget = HaveTank() else PQR_CustomTarget = "pet" end
if UnitCanAttack("player","target") and not UnitIsDeadOrGhost("target") and UnitHealth("target") > UnitHealthMax("player") and not UnitAffectingCombat("player") then return true end

Ability.Name: Scatter Shot
Ability.Lua: if UnitExists("mouseover") and IsLeftShiftKeyDown() and not GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus() then return true end

Ability.Name: Hunter's Mark
Ability.Lua: if UnitCanAttack("player","target") and not UnitIsDead("target") and not UnitAffectingCombat("player") and UnitHealth("target") > UnitHealthMax("player") and not UnitDebuffID("target",1130) then return true end

Ability.Name: Assist Tank
Ability.Lua:
if GetNumPartyMembers() > 0 and UnitInRaid("player") == nil then
local heisthetank = nil
for i = 1, GetNumPartyMembers(), 1 do if UnitGroupRolesAssigned("party"..tostring(i)) == "TANK" then heisthetank = "party"..tostring(i) end end
if heisthetank and UnitExists("target") == nil and UnitAffectingCombat(heisthetank) and UnitAffectingCombat(heisthetank.."target") and UnitIsDead(heisthetank.."target") == nil and UnitCanAttack("player",heisthetank.."target") then TargetUnit(heisthetank.."target") end
end

Ability.Name: Tranquilizing Shot
Ability.Lua:
if not DontDispel then function DontDispel(t) local buff = { 99646 } for _,v in ipairs(buff) do if UnitBuffID(t,v) then return true end end end end
if not DontDispel("target") then local i = 1 local buff,_,_,_,bufftype = UnitBuff("target", i) while buff do if ( bufftype == "Magic" or buff == "Enrage" ) then return true end i = i + 1; buff,_,_,_,bufftype = UnitBuff("target", i) end end

Ability.Name: Kill Shot
Ability.Lua: return true

Ability.Name: Serpent Sting
Ability.Lua: if not UnitDebuffID("target", 1978, "PLAYER") and not setAoE and UnitHealth("target") > UnitHealthMax("player") then return true end

Ability.Name: Raptor Strike
Ability.Lua: if IsSpellInRange(tostring(GetSpellInfo(56641))) == 0 then return true end

Ability.Name: Rapid Fire
Readiness
Ability.Lua: if select(2,GetSpellCooldown(3045)) > 10 then return true end

Ability.Name: Steady Shot
Ability.Lua:
if UnitPower("player") < 40 then reloadphase = true end if UnitPower("player") > 60 then reloadphase = false end
if reloadphase then return true end

Ability.Name: Aimed Shot
Ability.Lua:
if UnitBuffID("player", "82926") then CastSpellByName(tostring(GetSpellInfo(82928))) return true end
if not PQR_IsMoving(1) and not setAoE and ( select(7,GetSpellInfo(19434)) < 1700 or 100 * UnitHealth("target") / UnitHealthMax("target") >= 90 ) and UnitCastingInfo("player") ~= GetSpellInfo(19434) then CastSpellByName(tostring(GetSpellInfo(19434))) return true end

Ability.Name: Chimera Shot
Ability.Lua: return true

Ability.Name: Arcane Shot
Ability.Lua: return true

Ability.Name: Multi-Shot
Ability.Lua: if setAoE then return true end

Ability.Name: --- initialize ---
Ability.Lua:
if not xeroninit then
function SpecialAggro(t) local mob = { "Training Dummy", "Raider's Training Dummy", "Twisted Spirit", "Amani´shi Hatcher", "Hakkar's Chains", "Exposed Head of Magmaw", "Battleground Demolisher", "Ozumat", "Right Foot", "Left Foot", "Icy Tomb", "Risen Ghoul", "Mana Void", "Burning Tendons", "Wing Tentacle", "Arm Tentacle", "Twilight Assault Drake", "Goriona", "Ice Tomb", "Twilight Sapper", "Dreadlord Debilitator" } for _,v in ipairs(mob) do if UnitName(t) == v then return true end end end
function ImmuneTarget(t) local buff = { 642, 45438, 31224, 23920, 33786, 19263, 97417, 97977, 102915, 100686, 105784, 74938 } for _,v in ipairs(buff) do if UnitBuffID(t,v) then return true end end end
function HoldCooldown(cd) if GetMinimapZoneText() == "Deathwing" and UnitName("target") ~= "Burning Tendons" and cd >= 1 then return true end if UnitName("target") == "Warlord Zon'ozz" and not UnitDebuffID("target",104031) and cd >= 3 then return true end if UnitName("boss1") == "Alysrazor" and not UnitDebuffID("boss1",99432) and cd >= 3 then return true end end
if UnitLevel("player") ~= 85 then print("\124cFFD12727WARNING: \124cFFFFFFFFLevel 85 is required to use this profile properly") end
if GetLocale() ~= "enUS" then print("\124cFFD12727WARNING: \124cFFFFFFFFenUS language pack is required to use this profile properly") end
print("Sheuron initialized, ver: \124cFFFFE6402012.02.08") xeroninit = true
end
if IsLeftAltKeyDown() or IsMounted() or SpellIsTargeting() or UnitBuffID("player",80169) or UnitBuffID("player",87959) or UnitChannelInfo("player") then return true end

Ability.Name: --- special events ---
Ability.Lua:
-- Avoid sudden death on Ultraxion local fadingtime = select(7,UnitDebuffID("player",110070)) if fadingtime and fadingtime - GetTime() < 1.3 then RunMacroText("/click ExtraActionButton1") end
-- Avoid Hour of Twilight on Ultraxion, Delete next 3 lines if you are working as tank local channelSpell, _, _, _, _, endTime = UnitCastingInfo("boss1") if channelSpell == GetSpellInfo(109417) and endTime/1000 - GetTime() < 1.3 then RunMacroText("/click ExtraActionButton1") end
-- Avoid sudden death on Madness local tentacledeath = select(7,UnitDebuffID("player",109597)) if tentacledeath and tentacledeath - GetTime() < 1 then RunMacroText("/click ExtraActionButton1") end
-- Try to aim on Darkmoon Faerie Cannon local canontime = select(7,UnitBuffID("player",102116)) if canontime and canontime - GetTime() < 1.15 then CancelUnitBuff("player","Magic Wings") end

Ability.Name: Aspects
Ability.Lua:
if not UnitBuffID("player", 13165) and not PQR_IsMoving(1) then CastSpellByID(13165) end
if not UnitBuffID("player", 82661) and PQR_IsMoving(1) and UnitPower("player") < 40 and UnitAffectingCombat("player") then CastSpellByID(82661) end
